name: Mark Twain - The press
additionalNotes:
When that most famous of all cigar enthusiasts, Samuel Clemens aka Mark Twain, set down an essay in regards to tobacco, he struck the very essence of the pleasure of a good cigar:  “No one can tell me what is a good cigar- for me. I am the only judge.” Indeed! Well, we are pretty sure he would give 
Mark Twain cigars are delicious finds that will deliver serious amounts of pure cigar smoking joy. With great taste at a fantastic price, these sticks will prove once and for all that common sense is still alive and well.
